structural_inconsistencies.description: Older files use deprecated framework methodology without CLI integration

Verify if repeated yahoo_finance reliability scores are accurate or template artifacts
Replace generic peer rationale with ticker-specific competitive analysis
Update methodology field to reflect production_cli_services_unified_access

framework_evolution_analysis.evolution_summary: Clear progression from basic discovery to CLI-enhanced institutional-grade analysis
key_improvements: Economic context integration via FRED CLI
Enhanced financial metrics with calculated ratios

blocking_issues: Template file contamination in production directory
Missing CLI integration in 3 of 7 files

immediate_fixes: Remove or properly update TECH_discovery_example.json template file from production directory
Regenerate NVDA, SOFI, and BIIB discovery files using current CLI-enhanced framework (cli_enhanced_fundamental_analyst_discover)
Standardize command_name field across all discovery files to reflect current methodology
Implement consistent price_validation structure across all files with multi-source consistency validation
template_improvements: Implement strict validation for cli_services_utilized field presence and format
Add ticker-specific peer rationale generation requirements with competitive analysis depth
Enhance confidence score formatting validation requiring decimal precision (0.0-1.0 format)
Require economic_context_integration section with FRED CLI indicators for all discovery files
validation_enhancements: Implement automated detection of template artifacts in peer company rationales
Add cross-file consistency checks for framework phase identification and methodology
Strengthen ticker-specificity validation for discovery insights and business model analysis
Create framework version compatibility validation to prevent mixed-generation inconsistencies
cli_integration_optimizations: Ensure all discovery files include price_validation with multi-source consistency (yahoo_finance, alpha_vantage, fmp)
Standardize CLI service health tracking across framework phases with operational status monitoring
Implement consistent economic context integration methodology using FRED CLI economic indicators
Add comprehensive cash flow analysis validation with enhanced financial metrics verification
production_readiness_requirements: Achieve 100% CLI integration across all discovery files
Eliminate all template artifacts and hardcoded values
Standardize framework methodology to single generation (cli_enhanced_discover_7_source)
Implement institutional-grade data quality validation with confidence scores >9.0/10.0

compliance_gaps: Missing CLI integration in 42.9% of analyzed files (3 of 7)
Template contamination reduces data quality confidence
Hardcoded values indicate incomplete ticker-specific analysis
path_to_institutional_grade: Phase 1: Remove template files and regenerate outdated discovery files
Phase 2: Standardize CLI integration and multi-source validation
Phase 3: Implement consistent confidence scoring and validation methodology
Phase 4: Achieve >9.5/10.0 scores across all quality dimensions
institutional_compliance_assessment.estimated_effort: Medium - Requires systematic regeneration of 4 of 7 files and framework standardization
